Judul: PROPOSED MARKETING STRATEGY FOR EDULAB SEMARANG
Abstrak:
The competitiveness in entering National Selection of State Universities (SNMPTN) and Selection of Joint Entrance State University (SBMPTN) was increase. According to BI, there are 1361 tuition center brands in Indonesia so there is a tight competition to attract the 70,8 %  students who joined tuition center and increase 10% each year. Edulab Semarang join the competition with positioning itself as education consultant and compete with the other education consultant. To help the education consultant survive in a competitive market, marketing strategy is important. Edulab Semarang is one of education consultant for student in Semarang that want to increase their sales. 
 

The purpose of this research is to evaluate and plan the selection marketing strategy for Edulab Semarang using conjoint analysis. Conjoint analysis use to know the customerÃ‚Â’s preference on choosing education consultant.  The research initially conducted by analyzing the internal and external condition of Edulab Semarang, interview, distributing questionnaire and analyzing conjoint analysis. 

The result of this research reveals that from seven elements of marketing mix that mostly prefer by potential customer in Semarang as consideration on choosing education consultant, only three elements are considered as highly consideration on choosing education consultant. Those three marketing mix elements are price, program and people. 

According to this result, Edulab Semarang has to make marketing strategy from marketing mix elements with some consideration such as cost, coverage and contribution to help Edulab Semarang increase their sales. It needs commitment and leadership from Edulab Semarang to make the marketing strategy run well.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Yos Sunitiyoso, ST., M ENG., PH.D
Kata Kunci: marketing strategy, marketing mix, tuition center, education consultant, conjoint analysis
